website_summaries.verdict: Temperature and humidity readings are easy to come by, but the Eve Room is an apt sensor that can work for you especially if you have a specific need for its unique VOC readings. For now, though, it's severely limited in ways to use that info and barely qualifies as a smart device.
pros: Get accurate readings on temperature, humidity and the amount of volatile organic compounds you might be breathing with the Elgato Eve Room
It also has HomeKit compatibility built in, so you can use Siri to check on its temperature or humidity readings
cons: Without push notifications or rules systems, and limited in range by Bluetooth, you can't actually do anything with those readings other than look at them
It also takes days to properly calibrate to a new location

customer_reviews.title: It's okay...but that's it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if it's the app, the homekit technology or what, but it's kind of annoying when even background refresh is allowed the user has to manually refresh the app to get it to load historical data for the charting/longer term viewing. Other than that it works well. The ecosystem seems to be overpriced compared to its value: At $75 for a room thermometer and $50 for a switch, it's too cost prohibitive to do too much with the technology.
customer_reviews.author: R. C. Zeman

customer_reviews.title: I love this little thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this little thing. It works well with Apple's HomeKit and tells me the temp., humidity, and air quality. I keep it in my bedroom and can get a reading from my living room, so I would say the bluetooth works well. Battery usage is about typical, I assume. I don't have anything to really compare that to so you may have a different opinion there. All in all, I say it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Ama-zong

customer_reviews.title: Air Quality + Indoor Humidity
customer_reviews.text: Bought this over a year ago and after a year of great use I figured I'd rate the product. Checking the Eve App is a daily ritual for us, we love the opportunity to easily see the air quality and indoor humidity, both current and historically. I'm giving it 5 stars because it does exactly what we wanted it to. Battery life could be better, but overall we are very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Ljevon

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY FROM THESE PRODUCTS!!!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED REVIEW: upon the newest firmware update and iOS update all 5 of my Eve devices DO NOT WORK, tech support is a joke and the bluetooth and wifi (both having to be enabled for this junk to work) do NOT trigger the devices in a consistent manner. STAY AWAY!
customer_reviews.author: SnS

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE EVE ROOM - A TOTAL WASTE OF MONEY!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this device for about a year and it is a total piece of junk. It would work fine until the batteries died and then I would need to delete it from my network/eve app and re-add it. In February the batteries died and I went through the ritual of trying to delete/re-add and I could never see it again. Do NOT purchase this product it is a total waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: KillJoy

customer_reviews.title: Ive never used a device like this, but to my surprise it was useful ...
customer_reviews.text: Ive never used a device like this, but to my surprise it was useful and easy to set up. i installed the app to my phone and was immediately receiving data about my rooms air quality and temperature. It performs better than expected and i would recommend to anyone who wants to monitor their room while away at work or school. its great way to gauge if you should turn on your AC remotely before getting home so your room isnt too hot or too cold when you get there!
customer_reviews.author: Keenan Cornelius

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product, I'm using it to monitor humidity conditions ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product, I'm using it to monitor humidity conditions for cigars. The humidity accuracy is very good, I'd say +-1% or better. A couple of complaints. First, Siri integration doesn't work well. I ask her for the humidity, I can see the BT connect, and then it says it can't connect. Not the end of the world, and probably the fault of Siri more so than Eve. The second complaint is that the data is only accessible if you are near the device. So no remote monitoring, which to me is a big part of the whole smart-home experience. So in short, I give it 5/5 because, for what it was designed for it works great!
customer_reviews.author: M. King

customer_reviews.title: ERROR DE MEDIDA -46C Y -6
customer_reviews.text: I bought my room in Amazon three months ago, and it does not work well. He did everything that is indicated and still misses the temperature and humidity. -46 and -6
customer_reviews.author: Alberto

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well but annoying I can't check from outside my home.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Volk

customer_reviews.title: Connected home is great.
customer_reviews.text: Great concept. Tracks our air temps well. With my Apple TV, I can connect to it magically when I'm not home. Would be great for zone monitoring in a large house. I have two zones, and its nice to get real-time temperature and air quality readings from all over my home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works really well with the iOS app. The main ...
customer_reviews.text: Works really well with the iOS app. The main downside is that it is Bluetooth only, so I periodically open the app and walk around to all of my sensors to gather the data. But the Eve logs the data and downloads it all to the app when you do connect, so it works well enough for now.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Petersen

customer_reviews.title: ... to use and provides air quality data through a nice interface. I bought one to monitor my son's ...
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to use and provides air quality data through a nice interface. I bought one to monitor my son's room and got a second for the main living area.
customer_reviews.author: Adam J Day

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Only limitation is that you will need to be within Bluetooth range to update the readings.
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: These give you great precise data and save that data and shows it ...
customer_reviews.text: I have this indoor one and an outdoor one. These give you great precise data and save that data and shows it to you in graphs. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Nathan C. H.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: simple setup, works as described. wifi or Z-Wave would be great. wish it was easier to setup through apple tv. still working on that part of it.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Very nice with limitations.
customer_reviews.text: Works very good but is very limited due to being a bluetooth device. It looks like you will need Apple TV to hook it to the internet.
customer_reviews.author: JERRY E.

customer_reviews.title: Great data from these mini devices but be prepared to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great data from these mini devices but be prepared to take stock in AA batteries. This is a big draw back. I've only gotten a month per set of batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Walker

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good but you must be close to unit for connectivity
customer_reviews.author: None to show

customer_reviews.title: Have not been able to get this thing to broadcast ...
customer_reviews.text: Have not been able to get this thing to broadcast over the Internet which is why I got it. Probably operator error, I'll look into it when I get back home.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Works Well, but I'll pass
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Sensor, and functioned as described. I purchased this sensor to monitor my home from my mobile device. While the Eve has this capability, you need an Apple TV to use it. I did not realize this fact until I received the Eve. Pros: Easy to setup. Stylish design. Cons: Need an iPhone or iPad to use it. not android compatible Need apple tv to read data from outside of the home. Limited functionality (e.g. the "air quality" test only rates the quality of the air from poor to excellent, but does not show the levels of "volatile organic compounds." This device works well, but does not offer enough functionality for me.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Money-saving Home temperature Device
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate item. It will help manage temperature in your home. In return you save money and keep him comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Bronx Jason

customer_reviews.title: This product will only worth with Bluetooth connection so you have to be at the location to see the data.
customer_reviews.text: Product: OK made. The product quality is OK and does what is says. I wish there was a way to see the data when I am away from home and at a remote location. This product will only worth with Bluetooth connection so you have to be at the location to see the data. Delivery: Delayed devilry may be due to availability issues in CA area. Product package was OK but cheap. However, product was delivered without damage.
customer_reviews.author: Esfandiar Behrouz

customer_reviews.title: I wish it had a wifi receiver in it because ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had a wifi receiver in it because you cannot remotely access the information it gathers. It also doesn't sync automatically so you have to wait to download this inormation
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S.

customer_reviews.title: Work quite nicely for first couple of months
customer_reviews.text: Work quite nicely for first couple of months. While the range was limited it did allow me to easily monitor a rooms environment two floors away which is why I bought it. Then for some reason I could no longer get current readings. Reset keychain, iCloud, batteries, - tried everything I could find online. Nothing has worked and I can't recommend the product and suggest you avoid the frustration.
customer_reviews.author: David & Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: I love the Air Quality feature of the product but the bluetooth range is about 30 feet. It doesn't need to be connected continuously to bluetooth as it keeps your data for about 2 weeks. When I come home the data down loads to my app. There is no mounting bracket to hang on a wall so I just drilled two small holes through the battery cover and anchored it that way. Overall the Eve Room works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Richk60

customer_reviews.title: Eats batteries, no option to plug in. Software ...
customer_reviews.text: Eats batteries, no option to plug in. Software is limited. It seems to get updated, they recently added data export. It currently does not seem to support any triggers to for example switch on a fan or a heater.
customer_reviews.author: adna

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Product and No Live Support Option
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after about a month - it is stuck on bogus readings for temp and humidity. There is not way to contact someone at Elgato. You can just fill out a form on the website and hope they get back to you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor instructions
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were almost non existent and confusing. After hours of playing with it I gave up and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Must buy HomeKit Enabled Produxt
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Easy set up. Works perfectly. Bravo EVE. To Amazon... thanks to make best buying experience...
customer_reviews.author: Boen Tik LIEM

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Software is a little buggy. It works for its very narrow purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Fojas

customer_reviews.title: buy it only if you want to stick your self beside the device
customer_reviews.text: it does not work for more than 10m :D so funny that you need to be so close as it only connects thru Bluetooth
customer_reviews.author: Majid Alarifi

customer_reviews.title: Not working with iphone.
customer_reviews.text: Don't mean to bust the great reviews, But. Great product wish it worked. Downloaded the app but when I add accessory and select next, I have been getting the following message in red for the past 12 hours. "ICloud Data Sync is currently in progress. Please try again later. Update today is December 12, 2016, and it still isn't working Very annoying
customer_reviews.author: Barnaby

customer_reviews.title: does not work as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: unit will not stay connected more than a day at a time. Mine required endless troubleshooting, rendering it essentially useless for ongoing tracking of air quality. would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Click Here

product_meta.title: Elgato Eve Room Wireless (1st Generation) - Indoor Sensor with Apple HomeKit Technology, Bluetooth Low Energy
product_meta.description:
Eve Room


Live smarter by knowing more about the place you care about most. Eve Room senses indoor air quality, temperature, and humidity. Learn how to feel better in your home, powered by a sophisticated sensor analyzing volatile organic compounds (VOC).

Taking advantage of Apple's revolutionary HomeKit technology, Eve offers unparalleled ease of use, advanced security, and tight integration with Siri. Eve Room is powered by long-lasting, replaceable batteries, so you don't even have to deal with power cords.

About Eve
With Eve, see your home at a glance, right on your iPhone and iPad. The Eve family of HomeKit accessories gathers data on air quality, temperature, humidity, air pressure, energy consumption and more. Gain insights that help you improve your comfort, and make your home a smarter place. Use the free Eve app to view all data collected by Eve and control all accessories featuring HomeKit technology.
feature_bullets: Know your home: Eve Room senses indoor air quality, temperature, and humidity
Improve your comfort: sophisticated sensor analyzing volatile organic compounds (VOC)
Gain insights: your personal data by day, month or year
HomeKit-enabled: unparalleled ease of use and advanced security
Works with Siri: ask for temperature and humidity
Truly wireless: powered by long-lasting, replaceable batteries
Easy setup: direct connection using Bluetooth Smart technology, no hub or gateway required

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars92 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
